long_description: Perfect for backpacking trips and everyday use, the lightweight and rugged REI Tripod Mug holds 12 fl. oz. of your favorite beverage. 3 rubber feet grip many different surfaces to keep the mug upright. Lid fits securely to limit spills and help keep your beverage warm. Clip a small carabiner (sold separately) through the slotted handle to attach the mug to your backpack. Polypropylene mug is 100% BPA free. Remove lid before microwaving liquids in the REI Tripod mug. Hand wash only.
short_description: Perfect for backpacking trips and everyday use, the lightweight and rugged REI Tripod Mug holds 12 fl. oz. of your favorite beverage.
